A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I came away from this film not knowing what I'd seen. It certainly wasn't a Star Wars film. I don't want to spoil anything so all I'll say is if you wanted answers for any of the questions raised in the force awakens you won't get any. Be prepared to feel like your on earth constantly. Don't get attached to any of the many subplots. And prepare to dislike every character you learnt to love. Also I didn't realise it was meant to be a second rate comedy.  2 positives 1) badass leia 2) porgs
